He will be making his announcement tomorrow, said Nancy Mike Pence Fritsch, contacted today by telephone at her home in Columbus, Ind.. admitted she is "amazed" by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . She explained in an interview with The Sun newspaper: Simon Cowell and Sue say the things people wish they could in their jobs or at their school, but can't because it's not the done thing. "Just like him, she says what she wants because she can- there is nobody there to tell either of them to stop.
